title: Exercise Intervention in Breast Cancer Patients With Treatment-Induced Arthralgia

operands.value: Post menopausal women with a history of estrogen positive breast cancer who are receiving aromatase inhibitors for at least one month
Patients must complain of mild to moderate arthralgia
Ability to understand and sign informed consent
Patients meet criteria for low to moderate risk for moderate exercise based on the ACSM guidelines
Must have minimum age of 18 Years
Inability to comply with study requirements
Patients with orthopedic or neuromuscular disorders that preclude participation in exercise
History of MI, angina or congestive heart failure
Patients that are high risk for moderate exercise based on ACSM risk classification
Patients who exceed minimal physical activity recommendations from the US Surgeon General's Report: Accumulation of 30 minutes or more of moderate physical activity on most days of the week

symPyExpression: And(Symbol('Ability to understand and sign informed consent'), Symbol('Must be FEMALE'), Symbol('Must have minimum age of 18 Years'), Symbol('Patients meet criteria for low to moderate risk for moderate exercise based on the ACSM guidelines'), Symbol('Patients must complain of mild to moderate arthralgia'), Symbol('Post menopausal women with a history of estrogen positive breast cancer who are receiving aromatase inhibitors for at least one month'), Not(Or(Symbol('History of MI, angina or congestive heart failure'), Symbol('Inability to comply with study requirements'), Symbol('Metastatic breast cancer'), Symbol('Morbidly obese with BMI ≥ 40'), Symbol('Patients that are high risk for moderate exercise based on ACSM risk classification'), Symbol("Patients who exceed minimal physical activity recommendations from the US Surgeon General's Report: Accumulation of 30 minutes or more of moderate physical activity on most days of the week"), Symbol('Patients with orthopedic or neuromuscular disorders that preclude participation in exercise'), Symbol('Pregnant or lactating females'), Symbol('Rheumatoid arthritis'))))
